movie.title: Serena
movie.writer: Christopher Kyle (screenplay), Ron Rash (based on the book by)
movie.actors: Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Rhys Ifans, Toby Jones
movie.plot: In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when he marries Serena.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Serena unites an impressive array of talent on either side of the cameras -- then leaves viewers to wonder how it all went so wrong.
